name: 真乃
text: 灯織ちゃん、めぐるちゃん、おはよう
trans:
Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan...
Morning.

name: 灯織
text: あ、真乃！
trans: Ah, Mano!

name: めぐる
text:
おはよう、真乃！
プールで撮影した時の写真来てるよ！
trans:
Morning, Mano!
The pictures from our pool photo shoot came in!

name: 真乃
text: えっ！？　ほ、ほわ……
trans: Eh!? H-Howa...

name: 真乃
text:
あ……えっと、この前の写真が届いたんだね
私も見たいなっ
trans:
Ah... the photos they took at the time, right?
I'd like to have a look.

name: めぐる
text: じゃーん！
trans: Tadaaa!

name: 真乃
text: ほわぁ……！　どの写真も綺麗……
trans: Howa...! Every photo looks wonderful...

name: めぐる
text:
水しぶきがキラキラしててすごいねー！
こんなふうになるんだ……
trans:
It's awesome how sparkly the splashes look!
I didn't know they'd end up looking like this...

name: 灯織
text:
こんな表情してたなんて……
確かに、自分ではわからなかったかも
trans:
I certainly didn't realize I was making an expression
like this one, here...

name: めぐる
text: ……これ！　灯織が水にびっくりした時のだ
trans:
....Oh, that one!
The time you were surprised by the water!

name: 灯織
text: ……突然だったんだから、仕方ないでしょ
trans:
...Of course I was.
It was out of nowhere, you know...

name: めぐる
text:
でも、この写真のいつもと違う灯織って感じも
わたしは好きだなー
trans:
Though, I gotta say... I really like how this
picture shows a different side of you, Hiori～

name: 灯織
text:
もう……
それより、他の写真も確認しよう
trans:
Geez...
Anyways, let's look at the other photos too.

name: 真乃
text: あっ、この写真……
trans: Ah, this photo...

name: めぐる
text:
わーっ！　撮影が終わってから
アイス食べてた時のだ！
trans:
Wooah! It was when we were eating ice cream
after the shoot!

name: 灯織
text:
こんなところも撮られてたんだね……
この写真、気になる？
trans:
They even got shots of this, huh...
Do you like this one, Mano?

name: 真乃
text: う、うん、えっとね……
trans: Y-Yep... Well...

name: 真乃
text:
私たちが本当に同じ学校だったら
こんな感じで遊んでたのかなって思って
trans:
I was thinking that if we did go to the same
school, something like this is how would've
spent our time together...

name: めぐる
text:
わかる！
絶対３人でこうして遊んでるよー！
trans:
I get you!
This is definitely what we'd be doing!

name: 灯織
text: ……うん、そうだといいな
trans: ...Yeah, it would've been fun...

name: めぐる
text:
良いなぁ、休み時間にお話したり、
お昼に一緒にお弁当食べたり……
trans:
Maan, we would spend our break time talking with
each other, eat packed lunches together...

name: めぐる
text: 毎日、すっごく楽しいんだろうなぁ……
trans: Everyday would be sooo much fun...

name: めぐる
text: ……ああでも、わたしたちだったらどこでも楽しいか！
trans:
...Ahh, though... it doesn't really matter anyways,
because we'd have fun together no matter the
situation!

name: 灯織
text:
もう……
ふふ、でも……そうだね
trans:
Oh, c'mon...
Fufu... Though, you are right.

name: 真乃
text: うん、私もめぐるちゃんの言う通りだと思う
trans: Yep. I agree too, Meguru-chan.

name: 真乃
text:
あ、あのねっ
今日、みんなに渡したいものがあるんだ
trans:
B-By the way...
There's something I want to give you two.

name: めぐる
text: え？　なになに？
trans: Oh? What is it?

name: 真乃
text: これなんだけど……
trans: It's this...

name: 灯織
text: この写真……！
trans: This photo...!

name: めぐる
text:
わたしが撮ったやつだ！
プリントしたの！？
trans:
It's the one we took ourselves!
You printed it?

name: 真乃
text:
うん……３人で一緒の制服着て撮った写真……
素敵だなって思ったから……
trans:
Yep... I thought that the image of us together
wearing the same uniforms was really nice, so...

name: 真乃
text: せっかくだから、みんなにもって思って……
trans:
And I was thinking that all of us should have a
copy...

name: 灯織
text:
ありがとう、真乃
大切にするね
trans:
Thank you, Mano.
I'll treasure it.

name: めぐる
text:
わたしも！
いつでも見れるところに飾る！
trans:
Me too!
I'll hang it somewhere where I can always look at it!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……
喜んでくれて良かった
trans:
Howa...
I'm glad you two like it.

name: めぐる
text:
えへへ……！
仲良しの証だねっ！
trans:
Ehehe...!
It's the proof of our friendship!

name: 真乃
text:
うんっ
私もそう思ったの
trans:
Yep!
I thought so too.

name: 真乃
text: ……ふふ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 真乃
text: もう１度、みんなでプールに行きたいな……
trans: I'd love to go to a pool again with everyone, too...

name: めぐる
text: え？　プール？
trans: Huh? A pool?

name: 真乃
text:
あ、ううんっ
なんでも──
trans:
Ah, it's nothing...
Don't worry──

name: めぐる
text: すっごく良いと思う！
trans: That's a great idea!

name: めぐる
text:
行こうよプール！　みんなで夏休みの思い出！
今度はお仕事じゃなくて、ちゃんと遊ぼう！
trans:
Let's go to the pool! For our summer memories!
Not for work, but for our own enjoyment!

name: 灯織
text: めぐる……計画もなしにまたそんな……
trans:
Meguru... Jumping headfirst into another thing,
without a proper plan at all...

name: めぐる
text:
そういうのは後からでも大丈夫！
ね、灯織も行こう？
trans:
We can think about that later!
C'mon... are you coming, Hiori?

name: 灯織
text: ……い、行きは、するけど……
trans: ...I-I will go, but...

name: めぐる
text: やったー！　けってーい！！
trans: Hooray～! It's decided then～!!

name: 灯織
text: だから、もうちょっと計画を立ててから……
trans: Like I said, at least make some sort of plan...

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ……！
trans: Fufu...!

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんとめぐるちゃんと
夏休みにも遊べるなんて嬉しいなっ）
trans:
(I'm happy that all 3 of us can have this much fun
during our summer break!)

name: 真乃
text: プール楽しみだねっ
trans: I'm looking forward to our pool visit!
